pageContext.claim: “Twitter is getting rid of fake accounts at a record pace. Will that include the Failing New York Times and propaganda machine for Amazon, the Washington Post, who constantly quote anonymous sources that, in my opinion, don’t exist - They will both be out of business in 7 years!”
pageContext.analysis: The Post does not make up sources and as a matter of course runs its reporting by the White House to seek comment before publication. The Washington Post and Amazon are owned by Jeff Bezos, but the two companies operate independently of each other.
